Name: Machine Head
Ingredients: 30 ml Light white rum (charcoal-filtered 1-4 years old)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist and Luxardo Maraschino Cherry .
POUR first 7 ingredients (all except tea) into stirring glass.
SMOKE tea using a chef's smoker and direct smoke into stirring glass.
Cover stirring glass to capture smoke for a minute or so.
Remove cover, add ice and STIR .
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish, along with skewered maraschino cherry.
Review: Overdo the smoke and your cocktail will start to resemble a cigar. Too little and you may find a tad sweet.
History: Adapted from a drink created in 2010 by Jamie Boudreau at Vessel, Seattle, USA.
